name: Rogue Island Shooter
description:
This game is a prototype - please give your feedback on what you like and dislike!

Controls
WASD, left mouse to shoot
Follow onscreen instructions, they will lead you to your mission objectives.

It was made in 3 days by:

Code & Game Design
Dominik Traxinger - @domtrax
Michael Neuhold - @mikeneuhold

Credits for Artwork & Sound
player sprite: Riley Gombart
